alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pasco and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pebble Creek, or 7 miles east of Lutz, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Temple Terrace, Zephyrhills, Lutz, Zephyrhills West, Hillsborough River State Park, Pebble Creek, Zephyrhills North, Zephyrhills South, Wesley Chapel South, San Antonio, Zephyrhills Municipal Airport, Wesley Chapel, New Tampa, Meadow Pointe, Crystal Springs and Thonotosassa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
